welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aschaffenburg, a charming city known for its historic architecture, beautiful parks, and vibrant cultural scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly Lufthansa and Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Frankfurt Airport, serving mainly non-Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Currently under construction, Terminal 3 is expected to open in 2023 and will serve as the main hub for Lufthansa and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 24-hour time limit per device.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
